channel.title: CVE Feed for Sangoma Technologies -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sangoma Technologies -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-29216|2024-08-21T15:10:22.595Z -- sangoma%20technologies -- cg6kwin2k.sys
item.description: Exposed IOCTL with insufficient access control issue exists in cg6kwin2k.sys prior to 2.1.7.0. By sending a specific IOCTL request, a user without the administrator privilege may perform I/O to arbitrary hardware port or physical address, resulting in erasing or altering the firmware.
